trans-unit.source:
If you use Solr you have to set the name by following schema: 'host,port,core' e.g. 'localhost,8983,/solr/core-name'.

If you use Zend Lucene you just have to provide the index name.

If you use ElasticSearch you have to set the name by the following schema: 'index;host,port,path;host,port,path' e.g. 'typo3-content;first-server,8983,/;second-server,8983,/'
